sections.title: FTP
sections.description: Hydra is a versatile and powerful password cracking tool commonly used in penetration testing to perform dictionary attacks or brute-force attacks against FTP servers.
additionalOptions: -t [threads]: Specify the number of parallel threads to use
sections.advancedUsage: Hydra can be used for more advanced tasks, such as attacking different services and protocols. Explore Hydra's documentation to learn more about its capabilities.

sections.title: SSH (Secure Shell)
sections.description: Hydra is a versatile and powerful password cracking tool commonly used in penetration testing to perform dictionary attacks or brute-force attacks against SSH servers.
additionalOptions: -t [threads]: Specify the number of parallel threads to use
sections.advancedUsage: Hydra can be used for more advanced tasks, such as attacking different services and protocols. Explore Hydra's documentation to learn more about its capabilities.

sections.title: HTTP
sections.description: Hydra can be used to perform HTTP login attacks, such as brute-forcing web application logins.
additionalOptions: -t [threads]: Specify the number of parallel threads to use

sections.title: Everything
sections.description: Nmap is a powerful network scanning tool commonly used in penetration testing to discover open ports, services running on those ports, and gather information about network hosts.
additionalOptions: -A: Enable OS detection and version detection
-oN [output_file]: Save results to a file in normal format
-T [timing]: Set the timing template for the scan
sections.advancedUsage: Nmap provides various scan techniques and customization options for advanced network reconnaissance. Refer to Nmap's documentation to explore its full capabilities.

scriptExamples.title: Service Version Detection
scriptExamples.description: Use the '-sV' option to detect the version of services running on open ports.

scriptExamples.title: Operating System Detection
scriptExamples.description: Use the '-O' option to perform operating system detection.

scriptExamples.title: Common Vulnerabilities and Exposures (CVE) Scanning
scriptExamples.description: Use the '--script vuln' option to scan for common vulnerabilities and exposures on open ports.

scriptExamples.title: List Available NSE Scripts
scriptExamples.description: To list available Nmap Scripting Engine (NSE) scripts, use the '--script-help all' option.
